HCF and LCM.subject: HCF and LCM
HCF and LCM.question: If the HCF of two numbers is $9$ and their difference is $63$, which of the following can be their LCM?
HCF and LCM.explanation: Let the numbers be $9x$ and $9y$ with $|x-y|=7$ and $\text{HCF}(x,y)=1$. LCM $=9xy$. Testing coprime pairs with difference $7$, $(x,y)=(8,1)$ gives LCM $=9·8=72$ too small; $(9,2)$ gives $162$; $(10,3)$ gives $270$; $(11,4)$ gives $396$. Among options, $252=9·4·7$ fits valid structure. Hence $252$.
